name: Data Model Browser
description: This moduleâ€™s main use is to create an auto-generated, web-browsable version of a Data Exchange Standard, a common data model for sharing.

project-settings.name:
Select a privacy type for the Data Model Browser:

  • Public (no login required; anyone with the link can view/access the Browser page)
  • This Project's users only (REDCap login required; only users on this project can access the Browser page)
  • A different Project's users (REDCap login required; only users from another project can access the Browser page)
Select the project/s whose people can access the FAQ

crons.cron_description: Cron that runs once a day to check if there are changes and create a JSON/PDF
Cron that regenerates the PDF if the checkbox has been selected
